diff_hunk:
@@ -8426,6 +8426,89 @@ def test_numpy_index(self):
             self.assertFalse(isinstance(idx, int))
             self.assertEqual(x[idx], x[int(idx)])
 
+    @unittest.skipIf(not TEST_NUMPY, "Numpy not found")
body:
👍 Sounds great to me, I'd also prefer to have this tested on the pytorch-side.

I will port a few internal tests that test this integration and handle the numba library detection in a manner similar to how scipy is currently detected.
